title: TutorFlowAI
description: An interactive tutoring platform integrating real-time audio, a Large Language Model (LLM), a chatbot interface, and a digital whiteboard to create intelligent learning experiences.

title: WikiSurfer
description: A responsive website leveraging Wikipedia data to showcase thousands of top articles. Built an adaptive interface supporting swipe gestures for navigating the article feed across devices.

title: ChartAhead
description: An AI-powered intake platform that turns patient responses into physician-ready charts before their visit, integrating seamlessly into existing workflows.

title: Moonwalk with Einstein
description: A memory game inspired by Joshua Foer's book Moonwalking with Einstein.

title: Tryon
description: Try on clothing before you buy!

title: Lichess Open-Source Contributions
description: Improved the UI for toggling chatroom visibility, refined a link to chess videos, and contributed to a patch for a bug that made the chessboard unreadable with transparent backgrounds.

title: Remote Controlled Car
description: A remote-controlled car with a custom 3D-printed chassis, using Arduino and a breadboard to integrate the motor, wiring, and remote control system.

title: Tetris
description: A Tetris game in MIPS Assembly featuring a user interface, background music, and multiple difficulty levels.
